name: Greedo
Lore: 'Male Rodian bounty hunter. Sent by Jabba to capture Han. Arrogant, overconfident and not too bright. Trained by bounty hunters Nataz and Goa, who betrayed him to Thuku.',
Text: 'During opponent''s control phase, may ''threaten'' one smuggler at same site. Opponent may use all Force Pile cards to cancel threat, allowing you to activate same amount. Otherwise, draw destiny. If destiny + Greedo''s ability > 6, smuggler lost.',
